item.title: White gang tag graffiti has been sorted into Bus Shelter, 13th November
item.description:
FATZO 905 has been sprayed in white onto the glass of the bus shelter on Green lanes next to the Finsbury pub - please can it be removed before further gang tags appear - thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Lanes, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Graffiti / Flyposting on stop or shelter (non-offensive)

item.title: White sofa fly tipped on pavement outside 67 Shrewsbury Lane, 13th November
item.description:
The sofa was fly tipped overnight, as it was not there when I came home on the evening of Wednesday 12th Nov. It is located on the pavement outside 67 Shrewsbury Lane. Please can it be removed. Thank you.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Shrewsbury Lane, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Fallen tree within play area, 13th November
item.description:
A tree has fallen in the top corner of the play park. Children are climbing on the broken trunk and branches and someone could get hurt if it falls.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Glebe Knoll, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet
